searchEngine.name: Suchmaschinen
searchEngine.description: Bots von Suchmaschinen, die Websites für Suchergebnisse indexieren

Googlebot.name: Googlebot
Googlebot.description: Google's web crawler that discovers and indexes web content for Google Search, including both mobile and desktop variants that crawl websites to understand their content.

bingbot.name: Bingbot
bingbot.description: Microsoft's standard web crawler that handles most of Bing's crawling needs each day, indexing web content for Bing search results using both desktop and mobile variants.

Slurp.name: Yahoo Slurp
Slurp.description: Yahoo! Slurp crawls and indexes web content for Yahoo's search engine, collecting data to power search results and web discovery features.

DuckDuckBot.name: DuckDuckBot
DuckDuckBot.description: DuckDuckGo's web crawler that constantly improves search results by indexing web content, respecting robots.txt and providing users the best search experience.

Baiduspider.name: Baiduspider
Baiduspider.description: Baidu's web crawler that indexes web content for China's largest search engine, crawling and analyzing websites to provide search results for Baidu users.

YandexBot.name: YandexBot
YandexBot.description: Yandex's web crawler that systematically discovers and indexes web content for Russia's largest search engine, supporting various platform services.

Sogou.name: Sogou Spider
Sogou.description: Web crawler for Sogou, a Chinese search engine, that indexes websites to provide search results for Chinese users.

Exabot.name: Exabot
Exabot.description: Der Crawler der französischen Suchmaschine Exalead

PetalBot.name: PetalBot
PetalBot.description: Huawei's web crawler that indexes PC and mobile websites to build search databases for Petal Search engine and provide AI-powered content recommendations for Huawei Assistant and other Huawei AI services.

Yeti.name: Yeti
Yeti.description: Naver's web crawler that systematically discovers and indexes web content for South Korea's largest search engine. It crawls websites to build Naver's search index and support various platform services.

Flamingo_SearchEngine.name: Flamingo_SearchEngine
Flamingo_SearchEngine.description: Appears to be related to a search engine with web crawling and indexing capabilities.

YouBot.name: YouBot
YouBot.description: A web crawler used by You.com to index search results that allow their AI Assistant to answer user questions. The assistant's answers normally contain references to the website as inline sources.

GoogleOther.name: GoogleOther
GoogleOther.description: Google's generic crawler used by various product teams for fetching publicly accessible content, including one-off crawls for internal research and development.

omgili.name: Omgili
omgili.description: A web crawler used by Webz.io to maintain a repository of web crawl data that it sells to other companies, including those using it to train AI models.

Googlebot-News.name: Googlebot-News
Googlebot-News.description: A specialized crawler for Google News that discovers, indexes, and keeps news content up to date for Google's search index and news portal.

Yandex.name: YandexBot
Yandex.description: Web crawler operated by Yandex, Russia's largest search engine, for indexing and updating web pages in search results.

msnbot.name: msnbot
msnbot.description: MSNBot is Microsoft's legacy web crawler that indexed web pages for the MSN Search engine, which has since been replaced by Bing's crawling infrastructure.

GoogleOther-Image.name: GoogleOther-Image
GoogleOther-Image.description: Google's specialized crawler for image content discovery and indexing as part of various Google products and research initiatives.

Googlebot-Image.name: Googlebot-Image
Googlebot-Image.description: Google's specialized search engine crawler that discovers and indexes images across the web for inclusion in Google Images search results, analyzing visual content and metadata.

GoogleOther-Video.name: GoogleOther-Video
GoogleOther-Video.description: Google's specialized crawler for video content discovery and indexing as part of various Google products and research initiatives.

YandexAdditional.name: YandexAdditional
YandexAdditional.description: Additional Yandex crawler for specialized indexing tasks beyond the main YandexBot crawler.

YandexAdditionalBot.name: YandexAdditionalBot
YandexAdditionalBot.description: Additional Yandex crawler for specialized indexing tasks beyond the main YandexBot crawler.

msnbot-media.name: msnbot-media
msnbot-media.description: Microsoft's specialized media crawler for indexing multimedia content for Bing search results.

sogou spider.name: sogou spider
sogou spider.description: Web crawler for Sogou, a Chinese search engine, that indexes websites to provide search results for Chinese users.

googlebot-news.name: googlebot-news
googlebot-news.description: A specialized crawler for Google News that discovers, indexes, and keeps news content up to date for Google's search index and news portal.

Gigabot.name: Gigabot
Gigabot.description: The web crawler used by Gigablast, an independent U.S. search engine that crawls and indexes web content using its own proprietary search algorithms and database.

SeznamBot.name: SeznamBot
SeznamBot.description: Seznam's web crawler that indexes websites for their Czech search engine, providing localized search results primarily for Czech and Slovak users.

OmgiliBot.name: OmgiliBot
OmgiliBot.description: Forum and discussion board indexing bot for Omgili's proprietary search and aggregation engine.

omgilibot.name: omgilibot
omgilibot.description: Web crawler for extracting and aggregating discussion forum content and threads for enhanced conversational search.

Omgilibot.name: Omgilibot
Omgilibot.description: Forum and discussion board indexing bot for Omgili's proprietary search and aggregation engine.

msnbot-media/1.1.name: msnbot-media/1.1
msnbot-media/1.1.description: Microsoft's specialized media crawler for indexing multimedia content for Bing search results.

msnbot-media/2.0b.name: msnbot-media/2.0b
msnbot-media/2.0b.description: Microsoft's specialized media crawler for indexing multimedia content for Bing search results.

Bingbot.name: Bingbot
Bingbot.description: Microsoft's standard web crawler that handles most of Bing's crawling needs each day, indexing web content for Bing search results using both desktop and mobile variants.

Omgili.name: Omgili
Omgili.description: A web crawler used by Webz.io to maintain a repository of web crawl data that it sells to other companies, including those using it to train AI models.

aiScraper.description: Bots, die Websites für KI-Trainingsdaten crawlen

GPTBot.name: GPTBot
GPTBot.description: OpenAI's web crawler that collects data from publicly accessible web pages to improve AI models like ChatGPT, while respecting robots.txt and opt-out preferences.

CCBot.name: CCBot
CCBot.description: Common Crawl's web crawler that creates an open repository of web data, making crawled content universally accessible for research, analysis, and AI training purposes.

ClaudeBot.name: ClaudeBot
ClaudeBot.description: A web crawler operated by Anthropic to download training data for its LLMs (Large Language Models) that power AI products like Claude.

Bytespider.name: Bytespider
Bytespider.description: A web crawler operated by ByteDance, the Chinese owner of TikTok. It's allegedly used to download training data for its LLMs (Large Language Model) including those powering ChatGPT competitor Doubao.

Google-Extended.name: Google-Extended
Google-Extended.description: A user agent to control content access for AI model training in Google Gemini Apps and Vertex AI, providing opt-out capability for web publishers.

Meta-ExternalAgent.name: Meta-ExternalAgent
Meta-ExternalAgent.description: Crawls web content for training AI models and improving Meta's products by indexing content directly across the internet.

AI2Bot.name: AI2Bot
AI2Bot.description: Bot operated by AI2, a non-profit AI research institute. It's used to download data to train open source AI models.

Applebot-Extended.name: Applebot-Extended
Applebot-Extended.description: Used to train Apple's foundation LLM models powering generative AI features across Apple products, including Apple Intelligence, Services, and Developer Tools.

cohere-training-data-crawler.name: cohere-training-data-crawler
cohere-training-data-crawler.description: Web crawler collecting publicly available data to train Cohere's enterprise large language models (LLMs).

Diffbot.name: Diffbot
Diffbot.description: An intelligent web crawler used to understand, aggregate, and ultimately sell structured website data for real-time monitoring and training other AI models.

FacebookBot.name: FacebookBot
FacebookBot.description: A web crawler used by Meta to download training data for its AI speech recognition technology.

Timpibot.name: Timpibot
Timpibot.description: Used by Timpi's decentralized network of independent node operators. The index they build can be used to train LLMs (Large Language Models).

anthropic-ai.name: Anthropic AI
anthropic-ai.description: Unconfirmed agent possibly used by Anthropic to download training data for its LLMs (Large Language Models) that power AI products like Claude.

Claude-Web.name: Claude Web
Claude-Web.description: AI-related agent operated by Anthropic. It's currently unclear exactly what it's used for, since there's no official documentation.

cohere-ai.name: Cohere AI
cohere-ai.description: Unconfirmed agent possibly dispatched by Cohere's AI chat products in response to user prompts when it needs to retrieve content on the internet.

CCbot.name: CCBot
CCbot.description: Crawls the web on behalf of Common Crawl to build open datasets used for research, analytics, and training AI models.

Google-CloudVertexBot.name: Google-CloudVertexBot
Google-CloudVertexBot.description: Crawls websites on behalf of Google Cloud Vertex AI customers for AI agent training and data integration (not public search).

meta-externalagent.name: Meta-ExternalAgent
meta-externalagent.description: Crawls web content for training AI models and improving Meta's products by indexing content directly across the internet.

Ai2Bot-Dolma.description: Crawling agent for academic data collection or LLM research, managed by the Allen Institute for AI.

DeepSeek.name: DeepSeekBot
DeepSeek.description: Crawling agent associated with deep learning or web content indexing for AI purposes.

DeepSeekBot.name: DeepSeekBot
DeepSeekBot.description: Crawling agent associated with deep learning or web content indexing for AI purposes.

img2dataset.name: img2dataset
img2dataset.description: Open source tool for downloading images and metadata from URLs to build datasets, commonly used in AI research.

aiSearchCrawler.name: KI-Suchmaschinen
aiSearchCrawler.description: Bots von KI-gestützten Suchmaschinen, die Websites für Such- und Antwortfunktionen indexieren

PerplexityBot.name: PerplexityBot
PerplexityBot.description: The web crawler for Perplexity AI that indexes web content to power the AI search engine's real-time information retrieval and answer generation capabilities, enabling conversational search experiences.

OAI-SearchBot.name: OAI-SearchBot
OAI-SearchBot.description: OpenAI's web crawler that indexes websites for SearchGPT, collecting and analyzing web content to power AI-driven search results and real-time information retrieval in OpenAI's search applications.

Claude-SearchBot.name: Claude-SearchBot
Claude-SearchBot.description: Used to create an index of websites that can be surfaced as results in Anthropic's Claude AI assistant search feature.

aiAssistant.description: Bots von KI-Assistenten, die Websites besuchen, um Benutzeranfragen zu beantworten

ChatGPT-User.name: ChatGPT-User
ChatGPT-User.description: OpenAI's web crawler that visits websites when ChatGPT users request information. This enables ChatGPT to include links in its responses.

Claude-User.name: Claude-User
Claude-User.description: Dispatched by Anthropic's Claude AI assistant in response to user prompts, when it needs to fetch content to include in its answers.

Perplexity-User.name: Perplexity-User
Perplexity-User.description: Supports user actions within Perplexity. When users ask Perplexity a question, it might visit a web page to help provide an accurate answer and include a link to the page in its response.

DuckAssistBot.name: DuckAssistBot
DuckAssistBot.description: On-demand bot fetching content from trusted sources such as Wikipedia to generate real-time answers in DuckDuckGo's DuckAssist feature.

MistralAI-User.name: MistralAI-User
MistralAI-User.description: Mistral's AI assistant bot that performs web browsing and data gathering tasks for users in Le Chat, including opening web pages and retrieving information to answer user queries.

MistralAI-User/1.0.description: Mistral's AI assistant bot that performs web browsing and data gathering tasks for users in Le Chat.

aiAgent.name: KI-Agenten
aiAgent.description: Autonome KI-Agenten, die Websites intelligent navigieren und mit ihnen interagieren können

ChatGPT Agent.name: ChatGPT Agent

GoogleAgent-Mariner.name: GoogleAgent-Mariner
GoogleAgent-Mariner.description: An AI agent created by Google that can use a web browser. It can intelligently navigate and interact with websites to complete multi-step tasks on behalf of a human user.

NovaAct.name: NovaAct
NovaAct.description: An AI agent created by Amazon that can use a web browser. It can intelligently navigate and interact with websites to complete multi-step tasks on behalf of a human user.

Devin.name: Devin
Devin.description: A software engineering AI assistant that can browse websites and perform web-based tasks, functioning as a collaborative AI teammate for engineering teams.

seo.name: SEO-Tools

AhrefsBot.name: AhrefsBot
AhrefsBot.description: Ahrefs' web crawler that powers both the Ahrefs marketing intelligence platform and Yep search engine, constantly crawling the web to build a comprehensive link database.

SemrushBot.name: SemrushBot
SemrushBot.description: The web crawler and search bot software that Semrush sends out to discover and collect web data for their SEO platform including backlink analytics, site audit, content research and SEO tools.

MJ12bot.name: MJ12bot
MJ12bot.description: Majestic's web crawler that maps link relationships between websites to build a comprehensive link graph for SEO analysis, providing backlink data and domain authority metrics without caching personal content.

dotbot.name: Dotbot

SEOENGBot.name: SEOENGBot

xovi.name: XoviBot

sistrix.name: SISTRIX Bot
sistrix.description: Crawler bot from the SISTRIX SEO Suite, used for on-page analysis and web monitoring.

VelenPublicWebCrawler.name: VelenPublicWebCrawler
